rules.natural: Provided that the government mandates lockdown in the city, the system triggers an alert for the event.
Whenever the surveillance system detects a variant of the virus, the virus's spread is contained within the region.

Under the condition that the panel peer reviews the paper, then, if the journal publishes the findings of the study, it follows that the scientist's analysis of a strain from the sample leads to the surveillance system detecting a variant of the virus.
Whenever the population achieves herd immunity in the region, the global community ends the pandemic of the disease.
Either the hospital experiences a surge in cases, or the population achieves herd immunity in the region.
If the authority implements quarantine in the hotspot, then it is not the case that the hospital experiences a surge in cases.
Provided that the regulator fast tracks the vaccine, the regulator grants approval for the treatment.
The regulator fast tracks the vaccine, or the agency issues a warning to the public.
Should the agency issue a warning to the public, then the agency declares an emergency in the region.
If the agency authorizes research on the virus, then the government does not mandate lockdown in the city.
Whenever the regulator grants approval for the treatment, the agency authorizes research on the virus.
If the system triggers an alert for the event, then the virus causes an outbreak in the city.
Either the facility reports a shortage of supplies, or it is not the case that the journal retracts the study/paper.
The organization deploying aid to the region entails that the facility does not report a shortage of supplies.
The organization deploys aid to the region, or the agency coordinates a response with its partners.
If the agency coordinates a response with its partners, then the facility does not report a shortage of supplies.
Provided that the organizer cancels the events/gatherings, the hospital does not experience a surge in cases.
The organizer cancels the events/gatherings, or the government closes the venues/businesses.
If the agency declares an emergency in the region, then the government does not mandate lockdown in the city.
The committee's approval of funding for the study leads to the agency authorizing research on the virus.
The committee approves funding for the study, or the government suspends travel to/from the country.
If the government suspends travel to/from the country, then the government restricts movement in the zone.
Should the government restrict movement in the zone, then the agency declares an emergency in the region.
Provided that the health department activates protocol for the outbreak, the lab monitors mutation of the virus.
If the health department activates protocol for the outbreak, then it is not the case that the virus's spread is contained within the region.
Whenever the lab monitors mutation of the virus, the scientist analyzes a strain from the sample.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(verifies_data(researcher, dataset) -> (monitors_mutation(lab, virus) -> contains_spread(virus, region))) -> retracts_study(journal, paper))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that (if the researcher verifies the data in the dataset, then, should the lab monitor mutation of the virus, the virus's spread is contained within the region), then the journal retracts the study/paper.
Should it be false that (if the government closes the venues/businesses, then the hospital does not experience a surge in cases), then the agency faces criticism for the decision.
If it is not the case that the authority implements quarantine in the hotspot, then the government lifts restrictions in the city.
Provided that the global community does not end the pandemic of the disease, the government mandates lockdown in the city.
If the global community does not end the pandemic of the disease, then the health department activates protocol for the outbreak.

The government does not lift restrictions in the city.
It is not the case that the virus causes an outbreak in the city.
The agency does not face criticism for the decision.

(A1 → A21).natural: If the government mandates lockdown in the city, then the virus causes an outbreak in the city.

(A1 → A22).natural: Provided that the government mandates lockdown in the city, the system triggers an alert for the event.

(A10 → A8).natural: Whenever the surveillance system detects a variant of the virus, the virus's spread is contained within the region.

(A11 → A10).natural: The scientist's analysis of a strain from the sample implies the surveillance system detects a variant of the virus.

(A12 → (A11 → A10)).natural: If the journal publishes the findings of the study, then, should the scientist analyze a strain from the sample, the surveillance system detects a variant of the virus.

(A13 → (A12 → (A11 → A10))).natural: Under the condition that the panel peer reviews the paper, then, if the journal publishes the findings of the study, it follows that the scientist's analysis of a strain from the sample leads to the surveillance system detecting a variant of the virus.

(A14 → G).natural: Whenever the population achieves herd immunity in the region, the global community ends the pandemic of the disease.

(A15 ∨ A14).natural: Either the hospital experiences a surge in cases, or the population achieves herd immunity in the region.

(A16 → ¬A15).natural: If the authority implements quarantine in the hotspot, then it is not the case that the hospital experiences a surge in cases.

(A18 → A2).natural: The regulator fast-tracking the vaccine implies the agency authorizes research on the virus.

(A18 → A20).natural: Provided that the regulator fast tracks the vaccine, the regulator grants approval for the treatment.

(A22 → A21).natural: If the system triggers an alert for the event, then the virus causes an outbreak in the city.

(A23 → (A9 → A8)).natural: If the researcher verifies the data in the dataset, then, provided that the lab monitors mutation of the virus, the virus's spread is contained within the region.

(A25 ∨ ¬A24).natural: Either the facility reports a shortage of supplies, or it is not the case that the journal retracts the study/paper.

(A26 → ¬A25).natural: The organization deploying aid to the region entails that the facility does not report a shortage of supplies.

(A26 ∨ A27).natural: The organization deploys aid to the region, or the agency coordinates a response with its partners.

(A27 → ¬A25).natural: If the agency coordinates a response with its partners, then the facility does not report a shortage of supplies.

(A28 → ¬A15).natural: Provided that the organizer cancels the events/gatherings, the hospital does not experience a surge in cases.

(A28 ∨ A29).natural: The organizer cancels the events/gatherings, or the government closes the venues/businesses.

(A29 → ¬A15).natural: Under the condition that the government closes the venues/businesses, the hospital does not experience a surge in cases.

(A3 → ¬A1).natural: If the agency declares an emergency in the region, then the government does not mandate lockdown in the city.

(A4 → A2).natural: The committee's approval of funding for the study leads to the agency authorizing research on the virus.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: The committee approves funding for the study, or the government suspends travel to/from the country.

(A5 → A6).natural: If the government suspends travel to/from the country, then the government restricts movement in the zone.
